name: Shinji's 23rd Birthday: Ultimate Weeb Edition
description:
RTP NOT INCLUDED (YET...):
https://www.rpgmakerweb.com/run-time-package?fbclid=IwAR0KnBW0iFNcIRBjTegecrWV0P...

A short 1-2 RPG celebrating the birthday of legendary Shinji, as his friends embark on a forgettable quest

Featuring Brucker House members and friends, this is a remaster of a previous RPG celebrating Shinji's birthday updated with more friends and quality of life updates.
